basics.name: Qiang Hu
basics.label: BS in Data Science
basics.summary: A third-year undergradute, interested in Trustworthy AI, Efficient AI and LLMs

Research Experience.name: Vulnerability Disparity Against MIA
Research Experience.summary: Find an efficient way to distinguish instances with different levels of vulnerability in MIA scenarios; Try some relief methods, including reweight, kde-flattening, etc.

Research Experience.name: Top-k ICL for Content Risk Control
Research Experience.summary: Implement ICL for Content Risk Control; Establish a benchmark for large model risk control in domestic scenarios, including building data sets with crawlers (from Twitter etc).

volunteer.summary: The accumulated of the Shenzhen volunteer is more than 110h, and the service content includes assisting in various competitions, conferences, training, public welfare activities, etc

education.institution: Southern University of Science and Technology, ShenZhen, China
education.area: Data Science and Big Data Technology

awards.title: Provincial first prize in CPhO 2020(Chinese Physics Olympiad)
